document_data.caption: A map showing Whitefish Bay near the center of Alaron.
document_data.name: Whitefish Bay
document_data.mainbody: '''Whitefish Bay''' was a prominent bay located on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Whitefish Bay was located near the center of Alaron, on the island's western shore of the [[Sea of Swords]].
document_data.Description: The bay helped to naturally pinch the land in that region of Alaraon, and, along with the [[Fairheight Range]], formed part of the border with [[Gnarhelm]].
